name: Omnom Children
description:
Omnom Children. There are innocent plant and shroom children waiting to be eaten. You have until the sun goes down to eat as many as possible.

Made during Ludum Dare 33

Controls:
Move: WASD
Eat: Space/Left Click

Team:
Farah Khalaf | Artist | @farahkhlf
Sam Kim | Artist | @samkim_illus
Shelley Lowe | Programmer | @_shelleylowe_
